name: Nour Azouz
title: Full-Stack Software Engineer | Tech Lead, CTO, Instructor
intro: Full-Stack Software Engineer with 4+ years shipping production systems across web, mobile & desktop. Daily hands-on coding: architecting microservices, building scalable APIs, optimizing performance. Led teams as Tech Lead/CTO. Expertise: TypeScript, React, NestJS, DevOps. 30+ projects shipped.
about: I'm a full-stack engineer who leads by example. With 4+ years of hands-on experience, I don't just manage teams—I code with them, architect solutions, and ship features. At Defendr.gg, I served as CTO/Tech Lead: designed scalable microservices, led a team of 8+, conducted code reviews, built CI/CD pipelines (40% faster deployments), and optimized performance by 5%. I'm equally comfortable implementing features as I am mentoring junior developers and teaching at GoMyCode. I believe the best leaders ship code. I thrive in fast-paced environments solving complex engineering problems, whether as individual contributor, tech lead, or architect. Passionate about modern tooling, DevOps practices, and building high-performing teams.

education.degree: National Engineering Degree (Equivalent Master of Engineering) in Software Engineering
education.institution: The Private Higher School of Engineering and Technology (ESPRIT)
education.field: Information and Communication Technologies: Software and applications development and analysis

education.degree: Pre-engineering Degree (Bachelor's Degree) in Mathematical and Physics
education.institution: INSTITUT PRÉPARATOIRE AUX ETUDES D'INGÉNIEURS DE TUNIS (IPEIT)
education.field: Natural sciences, mathematics and statistics: Mathematics Physics

keyAchievements: Shipped 30+ full-stack projects from concept to production, owning entire architecture & implementation
Led CTO/Tech Lead role at Defendr.gg while actively coding—architected microservices in NestJS, conducting PRs, shipping features
Built scalable backend infrastructure: designed APIs handling 10k+ daily transactions, orchestrated Docker containerization, automated CI/CD reducing deployment time by 40%
Full-stack technical depth: developed BeeFood platform solo (React frontend, NestJS backend, Flutter mobile, GraphQL API)
AI/ML engineering: Designed and trained TensorFlow models for personalized recommendations (food suggestion system)
Performance optimization: Improved load times by 5% through code refactoring; optimized database queries and caching strategies
Team building & mentoring: Managed 8+ engineers as Tech Lead, conducted code reviews, established best practices, mentored 5+ junior developers
Teaching & knowledge sharing: Part-time instructor at GoMyCode teaching TypeScript, React, Node.js to 50+ students; strong communicator of complex concepts
Enterprise security: Implemented authentication systems, improved security protocols, handled sensitive data management
Full tech stack mastery: Expert in TypeScript/JavaScript, React, NestJS; Advanced in GraphQL, MongoDB, Docker, CI/CD; Proficient in Python, TensorFlow, Mobile (React Native, Flutter)
